author: gsim
msg: 1) The session-id reported by the management API now matches the session.name in the session table
2) management.py API has a new callback for closed connections
3) qpid-tool uses the closed-connection handler to notify the user of a lost connection

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-3602 If derbytesting.jar is in a different directory than the derby jars SystemPrivilegesPermissionTest fails with java.security.AccessControlException
Fixed test specific policy file to point to testing jar instead of all jars in the codejar directory for test specific permissions like setSecurityManager
